response_parsed.title: Unit Testing Serverless Handlers Using FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide will demonstrate how to write and execute unit tests for serverless functions built with FastAPI in Python 3.12+. We'll discuss key points, code examples, version notes, and potential caveats.
key_points: Understanding the importance of unit testing in serverless applications
Setting up a project structure for FastAPI and unit tests
Writing test cases using pytest and FastAPI's built-in TestClient

version_notes.note: FastAPI version 0.74.0 or later is required for built-in TestClient support.
Supports the --cov option for generating code coverage reports.

caveats: Remember to install required dependencies like FastAPI, pytest-fastapi, and pytest.
Test cases may require mocks for external services like databases or APIs when they're unavailable during testing.
Consider using a test database or setting up an in-memory data store for tests.
